hypothesis: VP with Gauss-Newton may converge faster than CMA-ES since it exploits the separable structure (positions vs intensity).

tuning_runs.notes: Local optimizer gets stuck (samples 10, 13). Low diversity (mostly 1 candidate).
Faster but worse accuracy. Same samples stuck in local minima.

key_finding: VP with Trust-Region Reflective is a local optimizer that gets stuck in local minima. The baseline already uses VP implicitly (computes q analytically), but CMA-ES is needed to escape local minima in the multi-modal RMSE landscape.
